title: Dublin City Stay in Buzzing Canalside Ballsbridge with Daily Breakfast
description:
Uncover the warm spirit, traditional pubs and vibrant culture of Dublin, staying at the fabulously-located Clayton Hotel Burlington Road in the canalside Ballsbridge, home to some of the city's most sought-after boutiques, pubs and bistros. Your escape includes daily Irish breakfast, one two-course set menu dinner and a traditional Irish welcome drink each on arrival.

**Travelling to Europe?** [Browse our Europe Collection](https://luxuryescapes.com/au/destinations/europe)
offer_address: Leeson Street Upper, Saint Peter's, Dublin, D04 A318, Ireland

title: Boutique Dublin City Stay With Gourmet Inclusions
description: Discover the warm spirit, traditional pubs and vibrant culture of Dublin, staying in five-star luxury at the historic Dylan Hotel. Housed in a grand Victorian building in an exclusive neighbourhood within close proximity to the city’s attractions, this stylish boutique hotel marries period features with contemporary luxury. Your escape includes a full Irish breakfast with a continental buffet and prosecco each day, a three-course dining experience with a bottle of house wine and a welcome drink each on arrival.

title: Stylish West Dublin Stay Close to City, Airport & Blanchardstown Centre Shopping
description: Experience the perfect combination of heritage and cosmopolitan living in Dublin at Crowne Plaza Dublin-Blanchardstown, an IHG Hotel. Just 15 minutes from the airport and city centre, you'll be within easy reach of the classic cobblestoned streets lined with vintage bookstores and boutiques, and the endless local pubs for a pint of Guinness. Near the hotel is the Blanchardstown Centre, the perfect place to indulge in some retail therapy.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Dublin - Blanchardstown, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Blanchardstown Town Centre, Blanchardstown, Dublin, D15 T1FD, Ireland

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Dublin City Centre
title: Ireland: Dublin City Centre Stay Minutes from Iconic Henry Street Shopping Strip
description: Holiday Inn Express Dublin City Centre, an IHG Hotel, is a gleaming gateway to the premier shopping district and buzzing nightlife of Ireland’s spirited capital city. Discover Dublin's best boutiques on nearby Henry and Grafton Street, venture out to discover historic Dublin Castle and enjoy a smooth whiskey at the Jameson Distillery before returning for a quiet moment at the hotel’s Express Café & Bar.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Dublin City Centre, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 28-32 O'Connell Street Upper, Dublin, D01 T2X2, Ireland

title: Five-Star Dublin Escape with a Heavenly Day Spa
description: Be warmly welcomed in five-star style at the InterContinental Dublin, an IHG Hotel, where old-school charms met with modern luxury. Make use of the exquisite day spa with relaxing treatments, a sauna and an indoor heated swimming pool. Be treated to exemplary service and listen to the soft sounds of a grand piano in the Lobby Lounge over a glass of wine, and feast on mouthwatering Irish cuisine at Seasons Restaurant. When you're ready to explore, Dublin's city centre is just a short drive away.
offer_address: Simmonscourt Rd, Dublin, D04 A9K8, Ireland

title: Dublin Parkside Hotel near Airport
description: Overlooking the soothing greenery of Santry Park, Crowne Plaza Dublin Airport, an IHG Hotel, is a relaxing haven only minutes from the airport. Take a soothing stroll across leafy lawns, or embark on a journey into Dublin to visit iconic distilleries, captivating museums and exhibitions. Enjoy enticing dishes at the onsite Touzai restaurant or kick back with a cool cocktail or cold pint at the Cinnabar Social bar. At day's end, retire to a welcoming and vibrant guest room for a well-earned rest.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Dublin Airport, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Northwood Park, Santry Demesne, Dublin D09 KN66, Ireland

title: Five-Star Boutique Dublin Heritage Escape
description:
Discover the warm spirit and vibrant culture of Dublin, staying in five-star luxury at the historic Dylan Hotel. Housed in the former nurses' home for the Royal City of Dublin Hospital, this urban hotel effortlessly marries the building’s unique history and Victorian features with modern luxuries and boutique comforts. Nestled on a Victorian street in one of the city’s most sophisticated quarters, the hotel places you in an enviable location south of the river, within walking distance of popular Baggot Street’s pubs, shops and restaurants, and a 30-minute stroll from the city centre. (test)

Behind the red-brick façade, a world of marble floors, heritage touches and Irish design awaits. Luxe facilities include The Eddison - an elegant restaurant with sunny verandas serving traditional Irish food - and the intimate Dylan Bar, the ideal place to enjoy carefully crafted cocktails and modern brunch fare. In summer, The Nurserie Terrace comes alive with spirited guests enjoying cool glasses of rosé. Each evening, cosy up in your boutique room or suite, offering luxe touches such as Nespresso coffee machines and a 'Good Food Ireland' hospitality tray with local treats.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select packages)**:

- **Daily à la carte breakfast** at The Eddison, serving pancakes, French toast and more
- A **signature cocktail, glass of wine or beer on arrival** to celebrate your escape
- **One three-course dinner** for two at The Eddison (stays of 3+ nights)
- **Upgrade to the next room category**, subject to availability (stays of 5+ nights)

**Want to elevate your stay?** Upgrade to a beautifully designed Experience Suite, with a lounge area, custom-made furniture and Irish-designed fabrics.

title: Music-Inspired Hard Rock Escape in Dublin's Buzzing Temple Bar District
description:
Experience the world-famous hospitality and warm spirit of Dublin, Ireland, staying in the heart of the city at the Hard Rock Hotel Dublin, on the doorstep of the breathtaking 13th-century Dublin Castle. Located in the buzzing Temple Bar cultural quarter - a 28-acre maze of vibrant cobbled streets on the south bank of the River Liffey, abounding with the city’s most vibrant pubs and eateries - the hotel is perfectly positioned for exploring the 'Fair City'.

Bringing Hard Rock’s legendary brand of entertainment to Dublin, this music-inspired hotel, stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice award 2021, oozes rockstar cool with spectacular ceiling art by Lasvit of Prague, David Bowie's boiler suit from Blue Jean (1984) and an electric guitar signed by The Cranberries in the lobby. There's also Hard Rock's signature perks such as The Sound of Your Stay® music amenities and in-room Rock Om® yoga. When you're not revelling in the hotel's edgy sophistication, the city beckons and icons such as the Guinness Storehouse, the grand 19th-century Gaiety Theatre and St Patrick's Cathedral are all within a 10-minute stroll.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select packages):**

- Delicious **daily breakfast** at Zampas Restaurant, inspired by the flavours of Peru and Ireland
- Treat yourself to dining, drinks or Hard Rock souvenirs with a **EUR20 hotel credit** per package to spend at Hard Rock Hotel Dublin Rock Shop or Zampas Bar & Restaurant
- Enjoy a complimentary **upgrade to the next available room category**, subject to availability (for stays of 3+ nights)

**Travelling with family?** Upgrade to the Silver Suite for up to two adults and two children (aged 11 years and under). See individual packages for details.
offer_address: 18 Exchange Street Upper, Temple Bar, Dublin, D08 AV24, Ireland
